description:
The latest generation of the tried-and-true Moab Trail Shoe is the most environmentally friendly to date. These multi-function day hikers have a cushioned insole and shock absorbing heel for comfort wherever you take them. The bellows tongue keeps out stones and sticks, and the Vibram rubber keeps you upright on slippery or loose terrain.

  • Uppers combine breathable mesh with durable full-grain leather
  • Waterproof-breathable membrane keeps water out
  • Closed-cell foam bellows tongue keeps out moisture and debris
  • Removable Kinetic Fit™ insole feels comfortable underfoot
  • Protective rubber toe and heel caps
  • Multi-density contoured EVA footbed
  • Merrell Air Cushion in the heel absorbs shock and adds stability
  • Midsoles are compression-moulded EVA, nylon arch shanks, and pronounced heel cups that cushion and centre the feet
  • Vibram MegaGrip® rubber outsole with 5mm lugs for no-slip grip
name: Merrell Moab 3 Apex Mid Waterproof Light Trail Shoes - Men's
